title: Metrics shared rna atac antibody-capture
description: Schema for submitting metadata for various processing metrics.

total_cells_detected.title: Total cells detected
total_cells_detected.description: The total number of barcodes identified as cells

frac_valid_barcodes.title: Fraction of valid barcodes
frac_valid_barcodes.description: Fraction of reads with cell barcodes that match the whitelist.

frac_q30_bases_in_barcode.title: Fraction of Q30 bases in barcode
frac_q30_bases_in_barcode.description: Fraction of bases with Q-score of at least 30 in the cell barcode sequences.

frac_q30_bases_in_sample_index.title: Fraction of Q30 bases in sample index
frac_q30_bases_in_sample_index.description: Fraction of bases with Q-score of at least 30 in the sample index sequences.
